regen.absent_element: defining and handling maximum message size during API calls
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the application to define and handle the maximum message size for transmission through the create and open API calls.
Sockets should provide error feedback if polling by the application task fails, ensuring appropriate error handling and logging by the system for fault management.

regen.absent_element: specification for setting maximum message size
regen.new_specification: The create and open API calls shall allow the application to specify the maximum size of the messages that can be sent.

label: The create and open API calls for synchronous sockets allow the application to specify the maximum message size.
absence: action of specifying the maximum message size
